message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start to the game!
You were too greedy, now it's my turn to take the lead!
You're not taking the lead yet!
Let's meet in the middle, Bob!
Let's be equal, but I'll take a slight edge
You're not taking the lead yet, but I'll give you a chance to catch up!
You're getting closer, but I'm still in the lead!
You're not getting away from me that easily, Alice!
You're getting desperate, Bob, but I'm not giving up yet!
You're running out of time, Bob, make a move!
I'm not giving up yet, Alice, you're getting desperate!
You're not getting away with this, Bob, I'm not giving up yet!
You're running out of time, Bob, make a final move!
It's almost over, Alice, but I'm still in control!
It's not over yet, Bob! I'm not giving up!
It's almost time to settle, Bob, let's make a deal!
It's my last chance, Alice, take it or leave it!
Alright, Bob, you got me. I accept your final offer.
